name: Helsinki Force 1: The Holocaust
overview: Based on the movie of the same name. The twin brother of Shinobi has been murdered, Shinobi seeks revenge against Dragon the Killer. But Dragon wields the entity sword and a legion of cutthroats, but a ninja is scared of nothing. This ninja action fighting game for 2 players offers a breathtaking ninja fight at first with complicated fighting techniques. After that it works into a first person maze. More missions follow. We suggest that the more experienced player plays with Shinobi, although it may be hard to learn the moves for a beginner. This is because the levels are becoming harder and harder the further you get. We also suggest that both players play with a joystick just to be fair, especially the "Rämpytys" level.
